resources.string:
SoundBrowser is a simple app for searching, browsing and playing sounds from https://freesound.org.


All sound clips are covered by Creative Commons 0 (https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0) license, and are shorter than 60 seconds of duration. To find longer clips or sounds under some other license, go to freesound web site.


The clip played is always a mp3 preview, not the original sound. In order to download the original sound, navigate to the sound's homepage from sound details.
